title: Plant-based edible films and coatings for food-packaging applications: recent advances, applications, and trends
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, Advance Article

Recent research has focused on using plant-based polysaccharides, proteins, and lipids to create functional films and coatings with desirable properties.
